name: John Cornelius
title: Project Manager – Infrastructure, Supply Chain & Operations

Skilled in resolving scheduling conflicts, coordinating contractors and municipalities, and sustaining >95% on-time delivery performance with >99.5% inventory accuracy. Expert in Lean Six Sigma, 3PL management, SAP/ERP integration, and cross‑functional leadership.

Supply Chain & Project Delivery: Scheduling Conflict Resolution & Critical Path Management
